mapper.select: SELECT t2.id, t2.type, t2.name, t2.code, t2.path, t2.component, t2.permission, t2.icon, t2.sort, t2.enabled, t2.deleted, t2.created_time, t2.updated_time, t2.created_by, t2.updated_by FROM sys_role_resource t1 JOIN sys_resource t2 ON t1.resource_id = t2.id WHERE t1.role_id = #{roleId} ORDER BY t2.sort DESC
